item.description:
Due to WGBH tour policies, the size of this meetup is limited to 5 participants.

Go behind the scenes for a 45–minute tour of WGBH's new all–digital studios at One Guest Street in Boston's Brighton neighborhood, and get an up–close look at what makes WGBH "crackle with creativity," to quote The New York Times.

All tours are docent-led and are offered at WGBH, One Guest Street, Boston, MA 02135
item.how_to_find_us: I will send an email to participants.

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Free Event: WGBH Studio Tour
